com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.common.dao

Class DaoProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.common.dao.DaoProvider

  • @Preamble(description="Utilities for fetching DAOs corresponding to a certain Model using reflection")
public final class DaoProvider
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DAO_SUFFIX
      Naming convention within the SDK is that the corresponding DAO of a model is named "model name" + DAO_SUFFIX.
      static java.lang.String LIST_DAO_SUFFIX
      Naming convention within the SDK is that the corresponding List DAO of a model is named "model name" + LIST_DAO_SUFFIX.

      • isContextSpecified

        public boolean isContextSpecified()
        States whether the underlying SDK context is defined or not.
        Returns:
        true if underlying context is specified. False otherwise.

      • isClientSpecified

        public boolean isClientSpecified()
        States whether an underlying Cloud client is defined or not.
        Returns:
        true if underlying client is specified. False otherwise.

      • getCorrespondingDao

        @Nullable
public static <T extends SdkModel> java.lang.Class<? extends ModelDao<T>> getCorrespondingDao(java.lang.Class<T> modelType)
        Gets the class of the Model DAO corresponding to modelType.
        Type Parameters:
        T - model type
        Parameters:
        modelType - type of the data model
        Returns:
        the class of the corresponding DAO; null if no DAO was found for this data model type

      • getCorrespondingDao

        @Nullable
public <T extends SdkModel,U extends ModelDao<T>> U getCorrespondingDao(T model)
                                                                            throws MbedCloudException
        Gets an instance of the Model DAO corresponding to this model.
        Type Parameters:
        T - model type
        U - model DAO type
        Parameters:
        model - data model
        Returns:
        an instance of the corresponding DAO; null if no DAO was found for this data model
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if an error occurs during the process

      • getCorrespondingListDaoName

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String getCorrespondingListDaoName(java.lang.String modelName)

      • getCorrespondingListDao

        @Nullable
public static <T extends SdkModel> java.lang.Class<? extends ModelListDao<T,? extends ListOptions>> getCorrespondingListDao(java.lang.Class<T> modelType)
        Gets the class of the Model List DAO corresponding to modelType.

        Note: this method defers from getCorrespondingDao(SdkModel) by the fact that the context is not passed to the returned DAO and hence, connection to the Cloud is based on global ConnectionOptions.

        Type Parameters:
        T - model type
        Parameters:
        modelType - type of the data model
        Returns:
        the class of the corresponding Model List DAO; null if no Model List DAO was found for this data model type

      • getCorrespondingListDao

        @Nullable
public <T extends SdkModel,U extends ListOptions,V extends ModelListDao<T,U>> V getCorrespondingListDao(java.lang.Class<T> modelType,
                                                                                                                   @Nullable
                                                                                                                   U options)
                                                                                                            throws MbedCloudException
        Gets an instance of the Model List DAO corresponding to this modelType.
        Type Parameters:
        T - model type
        U - list options type
        V - list DAO type
        Parameters:
        modelType - data model type
        options - list options
        Returns:
        an instance of the corresponding Model List DAO; null if no Model List DAO was found for this data model
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if an error occurs during the process

      • getCorrespondingGlobalListDao

        @Nullable
public static <T extends SdkModel,U extends ListOptions,V extends ModelListDao<T,U>> V getCorrespondingGlobalListDao(java.lang.Class<T> modelType,
                                                                                                                                @Nullable
                                                                                                                                U options)
                                                                                                                         throws MbedCloudException
        Gets an instance of the Model List DAO corresponding to this modelType.

        Note: this method defers from getCorrespondingListDao(Class, ListOptions) by the fact that the context is not passed to the returned DAO and hence, connection to the Cloud is based on global ConnectionOptions.

        Type Parameters:
        T - model type
        U - list options type
        V - list DAO type
        Parameters:
        modelType - data model type
        options - list options
        Returns:
        an instance of the corresponding Model List DAO; null if no Model List DAO was found for this data model
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if an error occurs during the process

      • newGlobalProvider

        protected static DaoProvider newGlobalProvider()
        Gets a global DAO provider instance.

        Note: this provider only returns DAO which are initialised using global ConnectionOptions.

        Returns:
        a new global DAO provider instance.
